item.title: Frameworks for ReFarming
item.description: Eliot Coleman‚Äôs ‚ÄúREAL Organic‚Äù Standards -condensed: First, for uncompromised nutritional value all crops must be grown in a biologically active, fertile soil attached to the earth and nourished by the natural biological activities of that soil. There are so many important soil processes that we could not replace even if we wanted to, because we are still unaware of all the benefits they contribute. Second, soil fertility should be maintained principally with farm-derived organic matter and mineral particles from ground rock.

item.title: Homage to James Lovelock
item.description: On the occasion of his 100th birthday, what to do? Funny: i had just been thinking of the man, when YouTube‚Äôs recommendation engine (whose advice i only take while making breakfast, as a rule) threw me this selection- James Lovelock CCLS2019 -from the Cambridge Climate Lecture Series.
